channel.description: Recent content in language on xbgbtx

item.title: Garble
item.description: Garble text by running it through a wold tour of language translation. Using the LibreTranslate API Garble translates the user’s input from English into a variety of languages before translating it back to English. The result is sometimes amusing and often very garbled. Garbleo and Juliet View the Source Code Try Garble in your browser now!
